amendment.description: An amendment numbered 164 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Lloyd James Austin III to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
